entry.title: [Xoxzo] API now supports Malaysia (MY)
entry.summary:
After ten months of it's release in Japan, we are proud to announce that Xoxzo now supports Malaysia (MY).

Just like developers and businesses in Japan are able to enjoy telephony functionality for their application or web services, Xoxzo - Cloud Telephony Platform now also provide the same beautiful APIs for SMS Sending, Voice and Dial In Numbers to developers and businesses in Malaysia

The details of each feature can be found in the linked pages, or you may simply register for free to and instantly try out our APIs here: https://www.xoxzo.com/en/
